name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts - Soft Validation Rules for Salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that works in tandem with the Alerts - Soft Validations AppExchange product to prompt Salesforce users with configurable warning messages on standard record edit forms prior to save.

Install the required AppExchange package to your Salesforce org first: https://appexchange.salesforce.com/appxListingDetail?listingId=a0N4V00000IkzfzUAB&tab=e
